projects.name: Harmony
projects.description: Made for families and in-home caregivers of individuals with long-term conditions, focusing on underrepresented and immigrant communities.

projects.name: Circles
projects.description: A dedicated app for close friends who enjoy capturing and sharing group photos of their milestones and adventures.

projects.name: Groove
projects.description: A social platform that lets users review and discuss songs, albums, and artists, enhancing engagement through personalized profiles.
